title: Whatâ€™s an example of a challenge I could offer?
body: Create a team-based running challenge, e.g., 'The team that runs the most by the end of the week wins.' Set metrics like random teams, one-week duration, and distance-based competition. As a user you can check your team, track the leaderboard in real-time, and motivate teammates to run more. Engage with your team, communicate, and strive to win together.

title: Are challenges specific?
body: Challenges can focus on distance, intensity, time, weight, reps, and more. They can be team-based or individual, competitive, or for personal improvement. Offer multiple challenges simultaneously.

title: Who is the app for?
body: Whether you're a commercial gym, specialised studio, fitness club, or a group of friends, oNex engages your fitness community anytime and anywhere.

title: When will the app be ready?
body: The official app will be ready soon, with early access available by the end of July.
